page.title: 07Girl Guides *** Youth Club
page.content:
This piece of writing is done by two of the guides called Amy Holman and Emma Withers. We call our leaders by nicknames in GUIDES. They are Jay, Chuck and Woodstock.Both of us enjoy GUIDES.It is held on Mondays. We make gadgets and play games. We work for our badges at home a lot. We already have map-readers, country dancing, entertainer and patrol purpose badges.
Mr. Redward runs the Youth Club with some help. You have to be ten to get in. It costs 10p for members and 15p for visitors. They have a lot of games like snooker, table-tennis, badminton and swingball. It is held at the village hall. About twenty five people come each week, on Tuesdays from 7.30 - 10.00 pm. They go on a few trips including barbeques and ice-skating in Bristol.
